text: I send my kids to school here and it was amazing. The school has many facilities and it was newly renovated. (Do you know the school changes a principle every 6 years?)we had our newest principle last year and this place is very good. (Please note that the photo is taken around 4:10P.M.)
Just graduated this year. Teachers were very supportive and encouraging. Students are also very helpful and kind and I mean it. Recommend sending your child to this school.
i js graduated frm prps, i will rly miss some of the teachers. the memories made frm the 6 years in prps will be cherished
Trivia: This building is likely the easternmost primary school in Singapore.
I graduated from there and I do not what have change but the environment was so great and teachers were so good to everyone in the class my teachers don't even shout at anyone before
